about_the_game:
Story

When Daniel arrives at University, he's confident that this new chapter will be the fresh start he needs in life. Eager to make new friends, pursue his passion for Mathematics, and maybe even find a girlfriend!

But when by twist of fate, Daniel discovers that his old bully Jake is also attending the same University, Daniel feels like all hope is lost.

No! Daniel tells himself. He didn't come all this way, just to give up! University was going to be a new chapter, and he's not going to let anyone take that away from him. This time, Daniel is going to stand up for himself!

This time, things will be different.

Game

"My Bullies Are Fucking My Mom" (MBAFMM), is a kinetic erotic novel.

Featuring a story of roughly 30.000 words and more than a 190 hand-crafted images, you will experience the dramatic story of Daniel, as he sets out to make a new start in life.

Combining both erotic art and an engaging story, players get to experience the best of boths worlds! Sure to appeal to fans of erotic novels, as well as those looking for a thrilling ride! Find out how the story of Daniel ends.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game graphically depicts sex. The story features elements of corruption, blackmail and dubious consent. Players that do not enjoy these themes should avoid playing this game.

All characters featured in the game are 21+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: When Daniel finally stands up against his old bully, Jake, he's never felt more proud! But Daniel could never have known just how far Jake would go to get his revenge...
